mapper.select: select bno, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt, show, (select count(*) from board_reply where bno=b.bno) cnt from kdemyboard b order by bno desc

select bno, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt, show, (select count(*) from board_reply where bno=b.bno) cnt from kdemyboard b
where show='Y' and (title like #{keyword} or content like #{keyword} )
order by bno desc

select count(*) from kdemyboard b
where show='Y' and (title like #{keyword} or content like #{keyword} )
mapper.insert: insert into board_attach (fullName, bno) values ( #{fullName}, seq_kdemyboard.currval )
mapper.update: update kdemyboard set viewcnt=viewcnt+1 where bno=#{bno}
mapper.delete: update kdemyboard set show='N' where bno=#{bno}
